text: @KamalaHarris Black Mainers make up 1.6% of the state’s population but account for 22% of the COVID-19 cases. The healthcare inequities here and across the country are part of systemic racism. We need to reform police and prisons as well as  healthcare and public education. #blacklivesmatter
